users

Class Idea

  • java.lang.Object
    • users.Idea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>

    public class Idea
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>
    Class Idea it's a class that represents an idea of a user that participate of a brainstorming session with some informations encapsulated. And also implements the interface Comparable for comparison of ideas.
    Version:
    2018.06.15
    Author:
    Lu√≠s Eduardo (cruxiu@ufrn.edu.br)

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Idea(User author, java.lang.String description, Session session)
      Creates a new Idea object given the parameters a User author, a String description, Session session and initializes a empty list of voters.

      • Idea

        public Idea(User author,
            java.lang.String description,
            Session session)
        Creates a new Idea object given the parameters a User author, a String description, Session session and initializes a empty list of voters.
        Parameters:
        author - A User that represents the author of the idea.
        description - A String that represents the description of the idea.
        session - A Session that represents the participant brainstorm session of this idea.

        public int compareTo(java.lang.Object otherIdea)
        Public method compare two ideas.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>
        Parameters:
        otherIdea - A Idea that represents other idea to compare with this.
        Returns:
        A negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this object has less voters than, equal to, or greater than the other idea object.
